revision.text:
{{wiktionary|bell curve|bell curves|bell-shaped}} The '''[[bell curve]]''' is typical of the normal distribution.
'''Bell curve''' may also refer to:
* [[Gaussian function]], a specific kind of function whose graph is a bell-shaped curve * ''[[The Bell Curve]]'', a 1994 book by Richard J. Herrnstein and Charles Murray * [[Bell curve grading]], a method of evaluating scholastic performance
{{disambiguation|math}}
